abstract: Venezuelan officials say police officer shot and killed 14-year-old boy Kluiberth Roa during antigovernment protests in San Cristobal; officer has been arrested.
lead_paragraph: The interior minister, Carmen Meléndez, said that the officer had been arrested and that he had admitted to firing on the boy, Kluiberth Roa, with a shotgun loaded with plastic pellets.

headline.main: Police Kill Boy During Protest in Venezuela
headline.print_headline: Police Kill Boy During Protest in Venezuela

snippet: The interior minister, Carmen Meléndez, said that the officer had been arrested and that he had admitted to firing on the boy, Kluiberth Roa, with a shotgun loaded with plastic pellets.
